reviewText: I am so glad I waited to purchase these movies on BluRay.  I purchased some earlier movies converted from DVD to BluRay format when they first started doing it, & it was kind of like copying the VHS to DVD.  They still had the grainy look to the earlier movies, and especially the movies from the 80's & 90's before BluRay was around.  Now the clarity is incredible!!  These movies look crystal clear!!
Item as described and on time.
Bought this primarily for "The Firm", but the other two films are great also.
Item as described and shipped promptly Recommend to all A+++ Thanks

Solid package for an incredible price. If you are a fan on one or all, this is the deal!!! I wanted The Firm & the price alone for The Firm Blu Ray was the price of this three pack. It is on three discs. Collateral has the DTS track on it, Days of Thunder & The Firm are in Dolby Digital. All three sound & look incredible. Director's (the late Tony Scott & Sydney Pollack) & Michael Mann.......the night is your's my friends!!!) Enjoy!!!!
I like the package, triple Holder. Great movies.
Great Movies Tom at the top of his game here the HD and Surround Sound was great stuff GREAT STUFF tOM KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK
excellent deal on 3 movies. all good movies to watch with Tom Cruise.
Saw 2 of 3 & am now collecting all film's I  like.
